summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting slope easements over portions of Lots 2-7, inclusive, Lots 10-14, inclusive and Lot 16, all in Jones' Supplemental Plat of Block 11 Burke's 2nd Addition; and portions of Lots 10, 11, 12 and 16, Block 16, Woods' Supplemental Plat of Blocks 16 and 17, Burke's 2nd Addition for street purposes. (31st Avenue South, et al, Paving)
